data.actual_result: All items are sorted A-Z except XBox which is at the top
data.expected_result: Items should be correctly sorted (not necessarily A-Z, but in a consistent way)
data.short_description: "XBox Live" item out of place in the Add connection menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Account settings > Connections  - Tap Add - Observe that all items in the menu are sorted A-Z except XBox
